headline: Cencora, Inc. (COR): If It Was Down, I’d Say “Double Down And Buy,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer’s Fresh 14 Stocks & Thoughts About Market Performance. Cencora, Inc. (NYSE:COR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cencora, Inc. (NYSE:COR) is an American pharmaceutical and healthcare services provider. It is a rare stock in its peers that is in the green this year. Cencora, Inc. (NYSE:COR)’s shares […]
